name: Kitty Cat Mah Jongg Solitaire
description:
"Great game--especially like the options"

"Love this matching game! Too Cute!"

"More interesting & more difficult than Chinese character Mah Jongg."

It's Mah Jongg Solitaire, with cats!
Play this special edition of Just Mah Jongg Solitaire for iOS from the folks at JustMahJonggSolitaire.com. Find matching tiles and try to clear the board. Plenty of options and features such as hints, shuffle, marked playable tiles and more.
